title: Love Island's Joanna Chimonides goes braless in a corset blazer for fashion shoot
text:
They are the reality star girls of ITV.

And Joanna Chimonides caught up with TOWIE's Chloe Brockett and Demi Sims as they filmed a fashion advert for Femme Lux at King St Townhouse in Manchester on Monday.

The Love Island beauty, 22, put on a busty display as she went braless in a white corset blazer, while Chloe, 18, and Demi, 23, slipped into PVC.

Here come the girls: Love Island's Joanna Chimonides caught up with TOWIE's Chloe Brockett and Demi Sims as they filmed a fashion advert for Femme Lux in Manchester on Monday

The corset detailing at the waist highlighted Joanna's slender figure, while the skintight cycling shorts made the most of her tremendous pins.

Slipping into black criss-cross heels and accessorising her monochrome look with a crocodile print handbag, the Love Islander oozed confidence as she tottered into the hotel- followed shortly by Chloe and Demi.

Chloe showed off her hourglass physique in a racy strapless black PVC minidress, which she teamed with a puffy sleeved white blazer and black buckle belt to cinch in her trim waist.

Strutting their stuff: Despite the rainy and miserable weather, Chloe, 18, (L) and Demi (R) appeared in high spirits as they sheltered under a large umbrella

Leggy: Chloe showed off her hourglass physique in a racy strapless black PVC minidress, which she teamed with a puffy sleeved white blazer and perspex heels

Demi, meanwhile, showed off her signature style in a PVC trench, which she teamed with white GoGo boots and cycling shorts.

She wore her blonde locks in a slicked back style and enhanced her bronzed tan with a glamorous make-up look.

Despite the rainy and miserable weather, the girls appeared in high spirits as they sheltered under a large umbrella.

Trendy: Demi, meanwhile, showed off her signature style in a PVC trench, which she teamed with white GoGo boots and cycling shorts

Close bond: Chloe and Demi have become close friends in recent times, despite Demi's younger sister Frankie pursuing Chloe's ex Harry Lee

The girls no doubt had plenty to catch up on after being subject to heartache recently.

Demi's outing comes after her ex Megan Barton Hanson admitted her new relationship got off to an inauspicious start after Demi discovered they had exchanged messages on social media while they were still dating.

Speaking to the latest issue of new, the Love Islander claimed Demi - who she briefly romanced while filming Celebs Go Dating - confronted her after realizing she was in contact with Chelcee Grimes.

Strike a pose: Chloe and Demi posed for a sizzling Instagram snap as they shared an behind-the-scenes look at the fashion shoot

'After the Celebs Go Dating finale party, Chelcee slid into my DMs,' she explained.

'She said I seemed really nice and wanted to take me out, but I told her I was seeing someone. I'm such a loyal person and didn't ever want to put Demi in that situation.

'Demi clocked that I was following Chelcee on Instagram and went mad.

'I showed her the messages and she just kicked off about them, so we drew a line under it. About a week later, I started seeing Chelcee.'

Meanwhile, Chloe was dating TOWIE co-star Harry Lee but things ended on a sour note and he has since begun pursuing Demi's younger sister, Frankie Sims.
